definition: (of twins) derived from a single egg or ovum
details:
adjective
- (of twins) derived from a single egg or ovum
= example: (of twins) derived from a single egg or ovum
= synonyms: monovular
- coinciding exactly when superimposed
= example: coinciding exactly when superimposed
= synonyms: superposable
- having properties with uniform values along all axes
- exactly alike
= synonyms: indistinguishable
- being the exact same one
= synonyms: very, selfsame
